hero.title: About Me
hero.subtitle: Student, Researcher, Developer - Building technology for social impact

paragraphs: I'm a passionate student, researcher, and developer dedicated to building technology that makes a real difference in people's lives. My work spans machine learning, IoT systems, and software development, with a focus on solving real-world problems.

Currently, I'm working on the Jal Sarovar project - India's first ML-based water quality monitoring system, which serves 800+ residents across multiple public and private sites. I've also conducted research at Johns Hopkins University on autonomous robotic systems for solar cell optimization.
